sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import baseURL from "../../api" const Register = () => { const [profileImg, setProfileImg] = useState() const [inpval, setINP] = useState({ name: "", email: "", age: "", mobile: "", work: "", add: "", desc: "", }) const navigate = useNavigate() const setdata = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target setINP((preval) => { return { ...preval, [name]: value, } }) } console.log(inpval) const addinpdata = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() const formData = new FormData() for (let key in inpval) { formData.append(key, inpval[key]) } formData.append("profileImg", profileImg) const { name, email, work, add, mobile, desc, age } = inpval const res = await fetch(baseURL + "/register", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify({ formData, }), }) const data = await res.json() console.log(data) if (res.status === 422 || !data) { console.log("error ") alert("error") } else { alert("user registered") console.log("data added") navigate("/") } } return (
{ setProfileImg(URL.createObjectURL(e.target.files[0])) }} />
) } export default Register
